title: Auto Expo 2023: Suzuki Corp announces global unveil of first EV as eVX - ETAuto
summary: Maruti Suzuki India Limited showcased the Concept Electric SUV eVX at the Auto Expo 2023, demonstrating its commitment to sustainable motoring and marking a step toward its 2025 EV launch. The SUV concept boasts a 60 kWh battery pack, promising up to 550 km of driving range, and reinforces Maruti Suzuki's vision of developing sustainable powertrain systems through continuous technological development and innovation.

title: How Recode's Shark Tank Rejection Boosted Its Growth ? - Indian Retailer
summary: Direct-to-consumer (D2C) brands in India are gearing up for the upcoming festive season with expanded product offerings, increased inventory, and technological advancements to cater to the surge in consumer demand. These brands are focusing on stylish casual wear, India-inspired products, and personalized gifting options, while also investing in supply chain optimization and online platforms to enhance customer experience. Notable innovations include a 'reuse program' for sustainable footwear, live commerce initiatives, and expanding retail footprints.

title: JK Tyre launches three off-the-road tyres at Bauma Conexpo 2023 - ETAuto
summary: JK Tyre, a leader in ultra-large off-the-road (OTR) tires, launched three new OTR tires at Bauma Conexpo 2023. These tires are designed for various applications, including wheel loaders, articulated dumpers, and skid steer loaders, and feature enhanced traction, mileage, and resistance to wear and tear. The new tires are targeted at both the Indian and international markets.

title: Rising production, EV transition, and global demand light up future of Indian tyre industry - ETAuto
summary: India's thriving automotive industry is driving strong growth in the tyre sector. The government's support through initiatives like the PLI scheme and Make in India is attracting investments and boosting domestic production.  As the adoption of electric vehicles accelerates, tyre manufacturers are responding with innovative designs and features to meet the specific requirements of EVs, including enhanced load capacity, reduced noise, and increased torque.
